verses.name: 2 Corinthians 5:5
verses.text: Now he that hath wrought us for the selfsame thing is God, who also hath given unto us the earnest of the Spirit.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 5:6
verses.text: Therefore we are always confident, knowing that, whilst we are at home in the body, we are absent from the Lord:

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 5:7
verses.text: (For we walk by faith, not by sight:)

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 5:8
verses.text: We are confident, I say, and willing rather to be absent from the body, and to be present with the Lord.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 5:9
verses.text: Wherefore we labour, that, whether present or absent, we may be accepted of him.
